attr.title: Nuclear Throne
attr.desc: Nuclear Throne is a post-apocalyptic roguelike-like top-down shooter. Not 'the final hope of humanity' post-apocalyptic, but 'humanity is extinct and mutants and monsters now roam the world' post-apocalyptic. Fight your way through the wastelands with powerful weaponry, collecting radiation to mutate some new limbs and abilities. All these things and more you could do if only you were good at this game. Can you reach the Nuclear Throne?
attr.inst:
Purchase your game from Steam.
 Use steam console to download_depot 242680 242683 1972149697962479575
Copy the contents of the assets folder into ports/nuclearthrone/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase your game [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/242680/Nuclear_Throne/).
 Open [Steam console](steam://open/console)
 Copy and paste command: ```download_depot 242680 242683 1972149697962479575```
 Copy the contents of the assets folder into ports/nuclearthrone/assets
